biography.summary: Brian Schatz is a Democratic U.S. Senator from Hawaii, serving in the United States Senate since 2012. He has focused on issues including climate, technology, and national security.

contact.office_address: 722 Hart Senate Office Building Washington DC 20510

timeline.event: Appointed to the United States Senate to represent Hawaii.
Elected to a full six-year term in the U.S. Senate.
Became Senate Democratic Conference Deputy Secretary (leadership role).
